channel.title: Click Tree Teleport (PI) REP++

item.title: Click Tree Teleport (PI) REP++
item.dc:creator: @runewings317 runewings317
item.description:
@runewings317 wrote:

Ok. I made it so when you click on the tree, with 18 woodcutting you will be able to teleport to the area you want.

case 2289: //Hollow Tree if (c.playerLevel[c.playerWoodcutting] >= 18) c.getPA().startTeleport(2845, 3341, 0, "modern"); c.sendMessage("The tree takes you to the Wood Cutting area!"); break;

Read full topic

item.title: Click Tree Teleport (PI) REP++
item.dc:creator: @Cres Cres
item.description:
@Cres wrote:

why would you teleport persons when they’re tryin to WC?

case 2289: //Hollow Tree
                        if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 15296) {
                        c.woodcut[0] = 1521;
                        c.woodcut[1] = 18;
                        c.woodcut[2] = 47;
                        c.getWoodcutting().startWoodcutting(c.woodcut[0], c.woodcut[1], c.woodcut[2]);
                        } else {
                        c.woodcut[0] = 1521;
                        c.woodcut[1] = 18;
                        c.woodcut[2] = 37;
                        c.getWoodcutting().startWoodcutting(c.woodcut[0], c.woodcut[1], c.woodcut[2]);
                        } else if {
                        c.getPA().startTeleport(2845, 3341, 0, "modern");
                        c.sendMessage("You've now obtained the thieveing and teleporting area!");
                }
                break;

else without if
and if without exception
sort of double fail…
explain what you want it to do

Read full topic

item.title: Click Tree Teleport (PI) REP++
item.dc:creator: @James-RevolutionX James-RevolutionX
item.description:
@James-RevolutionX wrote:

Basically, when you have 18 woodcutting you can teleport to a certain area by clicking on the tree (whilst you have 18 woodcutting).

This is what I have, but I got 100 errors;

	[code]case 2289: //Hollow Tree
		if (c.playerEquipment[c.playerWeapon] == 15296) {
		c.woodcut[0] = 1521;
		c.woodcut[1] = 18;
		c.woodcut[2] = 47;
		c.getWoodcutting().startWoodcutting(c.woodcut[0], c.woodcut[1], c.woodcut[2]);
		} else {
		c.woodcut[0] = 1521;
		c.woodcut[1] = 18;
		c.woodcut[2] = 37;
		c.getWoodcutting().startWoodcutting(c.woodcut[0], c.woodcut[1], c.woodcut[2]);
		} else if {
		c.getPA().startTeleport(2845, 3341, 0, "modern");
		c.sendMessage("You've now obtained the thieveing and teleporting area!");
	}
	break;[/code]

Read full topic
